column6: "CONFEDERENCY OF DUNCES" CONCLUDES!   The climactic conclusion to this fun superhero sendoff! It's a battle royale as the Punisher takes on Spider-Man, Daredevil & Wolverine. But whose side is the Hulk on? 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR+...$2.99
column8: | writer:Stan Lee | penciller:John McCrea | inker:Danny K. Miki
